    Creates a student with an unspecified person object, studentID or dob

    Creates a student with the specified person object, studentID and a date of birth.

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student()
      Creates a student with an unspecified person object, studentID or dob

    • Student

      public Student(Person person, String studentID, LocalDate dob)
      Creates a student with the specified person object, studentID and a date of birth. An arraylist of Modules is also created
      Parameters:
      person - The student's full name which is inside the person object
      studentID - The student's studentID
      dob - The students's date of birth

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()

    • getModules

      public ArrayList<Module> getModules()
      Gets the students modules that they are taking
      Returns:
      An arraylist of modules representing all the modules the student is taking

    • setModules

      public void setModules(ArrayList<Module> modules)
      Sets the modules that the student is taking
      Parameters:
      modules - An arraylist containing the student's modules

    • addModule

      public void addModule(String module, int grade)
      Adding a module to the array list of modules that the student is taking
      Parameters:
      module - A String that contains the name of the module
      grade - An int that contains the grade of the module

      public void setName(String name)

      Sets the student's full name
      Parameters:
      person - A Person object containing the student's full name

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overridden toString method prints in the format of "Name: person.toString StudentID: studentID Date of birth: dob" where person.toString is the students full name
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • studentModuleAccumulator

      public String studentModuleAccumulator()
      Making a string accumulator containing all the students's details and their respective modules and results
      Returns:
      A string representing the student details followed by the modules name and respective grade on each line

    • sortByModuleName

      public void sortByModuleName()
      This sets the modules so when they are added to the studentModuleAccumulator they will print based upon their name alphabetically

    • sortByGradeModule

      public void sortByGradeModule()
      This sets the modules so when they are added to the studentModuleAccumulator they will print based upon their grade sorted lowest to highest
